post.author: 고상호
post.content:
Good afternoon, I am writing to inform you of a new opportunity we have with a preferred client in the financial sector for a Senior Systems Develper (java based). Please review the attachment and, if interested: 1. forward a copy of your current resume in Word format 2. advise pay rate required 3. advise availability 4. contact me, Kate, at 416-322-0930 to discuss further. Many thanks in advance!
Kind regards, Kate McLarty Technical Recruiter Sapphire Technologies 416-322-0930
post.title: Senior Systems Developer - Job Opportunity
